name: Chutes and Ladders Canyon
description:
Introduction

Approach

Descent

Rap 1: tree on edge of cliff band

Rap 2: tree on left side of water course

Rap 3: traverse along ledge RDC to large juniper, rap into ravine

All raps completed with 40m rope and fiddlestick

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

First Descent by John Mecklin and Cooper Smith
